title: Why has NGT cleared the Nicobar project? | Explained
content:
The National Green Tribunal (NGT) has approved a project located in Nicobar.
*   The headline raises a question regarding the specific reasons or rationale behind the NGT's decision to clear this project.
*   The accompanying article is intended to provide an explanation for the NGT's approval.

title: Akhilesh questions removal of NSG cover, accuses BJP government of 'playing' with his security
content:
Akhilesh Yadav questioned the removal of his NSG security cover.
*   He accused the BJP government of deliberately 'playing' with his security.
*   He views the decision as a politically motivated move to compromise his safety.

title: IIT Madras launches online BS course on Management and Data Science
content:
IIT Madras has launched a new online academic program.
*   The program is a Bachelor of Science (BS) degree.
*   It focuses on the specialized fields of Management and Data Science.

title: Govt. provides jobs to sons of two Irula snake catchers
content:
The government has provided jobs.
*   The beneficiaries are the sons of two specific Irula snake catchers.
*   This action potentially offers support or recognition to the Irula community, traditionally known for their unique skills.

title: How SimpleGov initiative is simplifying processes for government services
content:
The SimpleGov initiative is designed to simplify various operational processes.
*   Its primary goal is to streamline the delivery of government services.
*   This simplification aims to make government services more efficient and user-friendly.

title: Kingston Engineering College near Katpadi becomes autonomous
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   Kingston Engineering College has achieved autonomous status.

title: Police seize 21 kg ganja at Katpadi railway station
content:
Police conducted a drug seizure.
*   A total of 21 kg of ganja was confiscated.
*   The seizure occurred at Katpadi railway station.

title: Estimates notwithstanding, T.N. government is hopeful of sticking to fiscal norms
content:
The Tamil Nadu government is optimistic about adhering to fiscal norms.
*   This confidence is expressed despite existing estimates that might suggest challenges.
*   The government remains hopeful of successfully meeting its financial targets.

title: BJP holds nationwide demonstrations, political parties denounce Youth Congress protest at AI summit
content:
The BJP is conducting nationwide demonstrations.
*   The Youth Congress held a protest during an AI summit.
*   Other political parties have denounced the Youth Congress's protest.
